About

The Epitome of Luxury

Beyond its gastronomic pflexess, Renaissance has always been synonymous with luxury. The restaurant's ambiance, adorned with lavish décor and impeccable attention to detail, creates an atmosphere of grandeur that transports guests to a world of sophistication and refinement.

Uriel Guimarães

9277+

Coffee Cups Served

Happy Clients

Winning Awards

Behind the Culinary Curtain

Nestled behind the scenes, our kitchen is a symphony of precision and passion. It is here that our team of highly skilled and imaginative chefs bring their artistry to life, weaving together flavors, textures, and aromas in perfect harmony. With a deep respect for culinary heritage, they draw inspiration from both global influences and local traditions to craft dishes that transcend the ordinary.

The kitchen is the heart and soul of our luxury restaurant, and we invite you to peek behind the curtains and witness the magic unfold. Join us for a culinary experience like no other, where innovation meets tradition, and every dish tells a story of dedication and love for the art of gastronomy.

A Cinematic Feast for the Senses

12 Rue de la Fontaine, Vannes, 56000, France

  • Friday - Saturday: 10am – 11pm
  • Monday: 11am - 9pm
